turns.text: get few rows from film table
Certainly! I'll retrieve a few rows from the Film table for you using the "pacha" tool. Let's fetch the first 5 rows, including some key information about the films.

input.python_code:
# Fetch the first 5 rows from the Film table
query = """
SELECT filmId, title, description, releaseYear, length, rating
FROM "default"."Film"
LIMIT 5
"""

data = executor.get_from_database(query)

if len(data) == 0:
    executor.output("No data found in the Film table.")
else:
    for row in data:
        executor.output(f"Film ID: {row['filmId']}")
        executor.output(f"Title: {row['title']}")
        executor.output(f"Description: {row['description']}")
        executor.output(f"Release Year: {row['releaseYear']}")
        executor.output(f"Length: {row['length']} minutes")
        executor.output(f"Rating: {row['rating']}")
        executor.output("---")
